text: Aşık Pasha Mausoleum in Kırşehir. Aşık Pasha Mausoleum () is a monument as the burial site of the 14th-century Turkish sufi poet Aşık Pasha (died 1332), located in Kırşehir, Turkey. ==References== Category:Mausoleums in Turkey Category:Buildings and structures in Kırşehir Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 14th century
title: Aşık Pasha Mausoleum
